ygData.subject: Screech and Z-Axis
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t used it much in a long time - so I don t know if this is very new - or always was there but terrain related... Anyway - I tried Screeching a Green
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't used it much in a long time - so I don't know if this is very
new - or always was there but terrain related...

Anyway - I tried Screeching a Green Mountain Giant in Frontier Mountains
and Screech basically completely didn't work. No resist messages - just
didn't take place. I was close enough to the Mountain to get hit by it -
but he was far enough away (due to Height Obviously) to be immune to it.

I recall using Screech many levels ago against one of the "oon" named
Ogres (I forget which one) in my mid 20's - and it worked nicely.

I think this is a problem we should have Verant look into. I even tried
to get RIGHT next to the Giant and sing it. Equipped the Brass and it still
didn't work...

Slyde Katzenjammer
40th Level - Xegony Server
